tweet: I will never regret you, or say that I wish I'd never met you, because once upon a time, you were exactly what I needed.

When in the end it just leaves us more broken than before...

And that's how you know you really love them: you forgive. Even if they didn't apologize.
What screws us up most in life is the picture in our head of how it is supposed to be
Someone you haven't even met yet is wondering what it'd be like to know someone like you.
I don't trust words anymore. I only trust actions. People can pretend to do a lot without being serious about it.
It's really simple: if they love you, you'll know it. If they don't, you'll constantly wonder if they do.
